quotes: Frank Dignum received his PhD at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam in 1989.
Since 2019, he has been Wallenberg Chair in Socially Aware AI at Umeå University in Sweden.
Since 2014 he has been a EurAI Fellow.
He received his BSc in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pará (1996), Amazon, Brazil,
MSc (1999) and PhD (2003) in Computer Science from Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
MSc (1999) and PhD (2003) in Computer Science from Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

roles.title: Associate Professor
quotes: Righetti is an Associate Professor jointly appointed in the Electrical and Computer Engineering and in the Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering Departments at the Tandon School of Engineering of New York University.
Since 2019, he has been Wallenberg Chair in Socially Aware AI at Umeå University in Sweden.
He received his BSc in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pará (1996), Amazon, Brazil,
Edson Prestes is Full Professor at Institute of Informatics of the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
He holds an engineering diploma in Computer Science and a Doctorate in Science from the Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, Switzerland.
